SELECT a.id AS a_id, a.name AS a_name, a.reg_date AS a_reg_date,
u.user_idx AS u_user_idx, u.user_id AS u_user_id, u.cdate AS u_cdate FROM APT a JOIN aa_dd_user u ON a.user_id = u.user_idx WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.id AS a_id, a.name AS a_name, a.reg_date AS a_reg_date,
u.user_idx AS u_user_idx, u.user_id AS u_user_id, u.cdate AS u_cdate FROM APT a JOIN aa_dd_user u ON a.user_id = u.user_idx WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT
asset.* FROM ( SELECT
asset.idx, dd_dong.full_name as loc_full_name, asset.sub_meta_idx as apt_idx, meta_apt.category, meta_apt.apt_name, asset.pyung, asset.pyung_type, asset.dong, meta_apt_dong.max_floor, IFNULL(apt_ho.ho, asset.hosu) as ho, apt_ho.hosu_type, apt_ho.main_purps, apt_ho.floor AS ho_floor, apt_ho.top_yn AS ho_top_yn, IFNULL(asset.floor, apt_ho.floor) as floor, asset.is_floor_open, asset.floor_sub, asset.floor_top, meta_apt_dong.dong_name as _dong_name, meta_apt_dong.dong_idx, meta_apt_dong.max_floor as dong_max_floor, meta_apt_room.supply_area as _supply_area, meta_apt_room.supply_area_p as _supply_area_p, meta_apt_room.supply_area_p_type as _supply_area_p_type, meta_apt_room.exclusive_area as _exclusive_area, IFNULL(etc.room_count, meta_apt_room.room) as room, IFNULL(etc.bathroom_count, meta_apt_room.bathroom) as bathroom, asset.room_count as etc_room_count, asset.bathroom_count as etc_bathroom_count, asset.in_date_date, IFNULL(etc.has_price_expand, false) as has_expand_price, IFNULL(etc.price_expand, 0) as expand_price, IFNULL(etc.has_price_option, false) as has_option_price, IFNULL(etc.price_option, 0) as option_price, asset.kind_m, asset.kind_j, asset.kind_w, asset.kind_s, IFNULL(asset.kind_b, 0) as kind_b, asset.real_flag, asset.is_recommend, asset.is_only_user_open, (select target_person_asset_idx from aa_dd_asset_open WHERE new_asset_idx = asset.idx) as open_target_asset_idx, asset.singo_flag, (CASE WHEN asset.agency_idx IS NULL THEN 'person' WHEN asset.agency_idx = NULL THEN 'me' ELSE 'agency' END) AS registered_by, (SELECT asset_comment FROM aa_dd_asset_comment where asset_gubun = 1 AND agency_idx = NULL AND new_asset_idx = asset.idx) as my_memo, asset.has_yungja, asset.yungja_price, asset.is_invest, asset.invest_price, asset.invest_indate, asset.pic_approve_flag, (SELECT url FROM aa_dd_asset_picture WHERE asset_gubun = 1 AND asset_idx = asset.idx AND del is FALSE ORDER BY ord LIMIT 1) as asset_pic, (SELECT url FROM aa_dd_meta_apt_picture WHERE apt_idx = asset.sub_meta_idx AND room_idx = asset.room_idx AND del is FALSE ORDER BY ord LIMIT 1) as meta_pic, asset.customer_memo, (SELECT is_blind FROM aa_dd_asset_memo_blind WHERE asset_idx = asset.idx AND asset_type = 1) as is_blind, agency.mobile as agency_tel, agency.nick as agency_name, agency.cert_yn as cert_yn, agent.agent_name, agent.biznum, agent.tel as agent_tel, agent.ceo_name as ceo_name, agent.addr as agent_addr, agent.pic as agent_pic, agency.pic as agency_pic, bunyang.bunyang_type, bunyang.indate as bunyang_indate, bunyang.bunyang_show_type as bunyang_show_type, asset.price_m, asset.price_j, asset.price_w, asset.price_wbo, asset.price_s, asset.price_sbo, asset.price_p, asset.renewal_flag, hi.bunyang_price, hi.member_bunyang_price, asset.price_bunyang, old_asset.date_order,
IF(clip.clip_idx IS NULL, FALSE, TRUE) as clip,
DATE_FORMAT(asset.date_disp, '%y.%m.%d') as date_disp, DATE(asset.date_disp) = DATE(now()) AND DATE(asset.cdate) = DATE(now()) as today, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%y') as cur_year FROM (SELECT asset.*, etc.room_idx, etc.dong_idx, etc.pyung, etc.pyung_type, etc.dong, etc.floor, etc.floor_sub, etc.is_floor_open, etc.floor_top, etc.in_date_date, etc.has_price_expand, etc.price_expand, etc.has_price_option, etc.price_option, etc.price_bunyang, etc.has_yungja, etc.yungja_price, etc.invest_price, etc.is_invest, etc.invest_indate, etc.renewal_flag, etc.room_count, etc.bathroom_count, etc.kind_b, etc.hosu, etc.in_date_flag, etc.old_in_date_data, etc.direction, memo.customer_memo, memo.short_memo, (SELECT asset_comment FROM aa_dd_asset_comment where asset_gubun = 1 AND agency_idx = NULL AND new_asset_idx = asset.idx) as my_memo FROM new_dd_asset asset LEFT JOIN new_dd_asset_apt_etc etc ON etc.asset_idx = asset.idx LEFT JOIN new_dd_asset_ad_memo memo ON memo.asset_idx = asset.idx WHERE asset_type = 1 AND asset.is_ad IS TRUE AND asset.comp_flag NOT IN ('C', 'M', 'Z') AND asset.is_deleted IS FALSE
AND asset.singo_flag NOT IN ('C') AND asset.agency_idx IS NOT NULL
AND asset.date_disp >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH)
AND asset.sub_meta_idx = 13231 ) asset LEFT JOIN aa_dd_meta_apt as meta_apt ON (meta_apt.apt_idx = asset.sub_meta_idx) LEFT JOIN aa_dd_dong as dd_dong ON (dd_dong.code = meta_apt.dong_code) LEFT JOIN aa_dd_meta_apt_room as meta_apt_room ON (meta_apt_room.room_idx = asset.room_idx) LEFT JOIN aa_dd_agency as agency ON (agency.agency_idx = asset.agency_idx) LEFT JOIN aa_dd_agent as agent ON (agent.agent_idx = agency.agent_idx) LEFT JOIN aa_dd_meta_apt_ho as apt_ho ON asset.meta_idx = apt_ho.ho_idx LEFT JOIN aa_dd_meta_apt_ho_info apt_ho_info ON apt_ho.ho_idx = apt_ho_info.ho_idx LEFT JOIN aa_dd_meta_apt_dong as meta_apt_dong ON (meta_apt_dong.dong_idx = asset.dong_idx) LEFT JOIN aa_dd_meta_apt_bunyang as bunyang ON (asset.sub_meta_idx = bunyang.apt_idx AND bunyang.is_complete = 0) LEFT JOIN aa_dd_meta_apt_ho_info as hi ON asset.meta_idx = hi.ho_idx LEFT JOIN new_dd_asset_apt_etc as etc ON etc.asset_idx = asset.idx LEFT JOIN aa_dd_asset_apt as old_asset ON old_asset.idx = asset.old_idx
LEFT JOIN aa_dd_user_clip as clip ON (clip.clip_gubun = 1 AND clip.user_idx = -1 AND clip.new_asset_idx = asset.idx AND clip.del = false)
) AS asset
ORDER BY
date_disp DESC ,
asset.date_disp DESC, IF(asset.is_recommend IS TRUE, 0, 1), IF(asset.real_flag = 'Y', 0, 1), asset.date_order LIMIT 0, 40;
